title: RoboCop
description: In a dystopic and crime-ridden Detroit, a terminally wounded cop returns to the force as a powerful cyborg haunted by submerged memories.
cast: Peter Weller, Nancy Allen, Kurtwood Smith

title: Blade Runner
description: A blade runner must pursue and terminate four replicants who stole a ship in space, and have returned to Earth to find their creator.
cast: Harrison Ford, Rutger Hauer, Sean Young

title: Total Recall
description: When a man goes in to have virtual vacation memories of the planet Mars implanted in his mind, an unexpected and harrowing series of events forces him to go to the planet for real - or is he?
cast: Arnold Schwarzenegger, Sharon Stone, Michael Ironside

title: Alien
description: The crew of a commercial spacecraft encounter a deadly lifeform after investigating an unknown transmission.
cast: Sigourney Weaver, Tom Skerritt, John Hurt

title: Escape from New York
description: In 1997, when the U.S. president crashes into Manhattan, now a giant maximum security prison, a convicted bank robber is sent in to rescue him.
cast: Kurt Russell, Lee Van Cleef, Donald Pleasence

title: The Terminator
description: A human soldier is sent from 2029 to 1984 to stop an almost indestructible cyborg killing machine, sent from the same year, which has been programmed to execute a young woman whose unborn son is the key to humanity's future salvation.
cast: Arnold Schwarzenegger, Linda Hamilton, Michael Biehn

title: Starship Troopers
description: Humans in a fascist, militaristic future wage war with giant alien bugs.
cast: Casper Van Dien, Denise Richards, Dina Meyer

title: 2001: A Space Odyssey
description: The Monoliths push humanity to reach for the stars; after their discovery in Africa generations ago, the mysterious objects lead mankind on an awesome journey to Jupiter, with the help of H.A.L. 9000: the world's greatest supercomputer.
cast: Keir Dullea, Gary Lockwood, William Sylvester

title: Invasion of the Body Snatchers
description: When strange seeds drift to earth from space, mysterious pods begin to grow and invade San Francisco, California, where they replicate the residents into emotionless automatons one body at a time.
cast: Donald Sutherland, Brooke Adams, Jeff Goldblum

title: The Twilight Zone
description: Ordinary people find themselves in extraordinarily astounding situations, which they each try to solve in a remarkable manner.
cast: Rod Serling, Robert McCord, Jay Overholts

title: Ghost in The Shell
description: Ghost in the Shell: Stand Alone Complex
cast: Shirô Saitô, Mary Elizabeth McGlynn, William Frederick Knight

title: Battlestar Galactica
description: When an old enemy, the Cylons, resurface and obliterate the 12 colonies, the crew of the aged Galactica protect a small civilian fleet - the last of humanity - as they journey toward the fabled 13th colony, Earth.
cast: Edward James Olmos, Mary McDonnell, Jamie Bamber

title: Utopia
description: After a group of people, who meet online, discover a bizarre graphic novel which seems to hold mysterious answers, they find themselves being tracked down by a merciless organization known merely as 'The Network'.
cast: Adeel Akhtar, Paul Higgins, Neil Maskell

title: X-Files
description: Two F.B.I. Agents, Fox Mulder the believer and Dana Scully the skeptic, investigate the strange and unexplained, while hidden forces work to impede their efforts.
cast: David Duchovny, Gillian Anderson, Mitch Pileggi

title: The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy
description: Arthur Dent and his friend Ford Prefect escape the destruction of Earth only to face incredible trials, tribulations and adventures in space and time.
cast: Simon Jones, David Dixon, Peter Jones

title: Cowboy Bebop
description: The futuristic misadventures and tragedies of an easygoing bounty hunter and his partners.
cast: Kôichi Yamadera,Unshô Ishizuka, Megumi Hayashibara

title: Evil Dead
description: Five friends travel to a cabin in the woods, where they unknowingly release flesh-possessing demons.
cast: Bruce Campbell, Betsy Baker, Ellen Sandweiss

title: The Thing
description: A research team in Antarctica is hunted by a shape-shifting alien that assumes the appearance of its victims.
cast: Kurt Russell, Wilford Brimley, Keith David

title: The Shining
description: A family heads to an isolated hotel for the winter where a sinister presence influences the father into violence, while his psychic son sees horrific forebodings from both past and future.
cast: Jack Nicholson, Shelley Duvall, Danny Lloyd

title: Halloween
description: Fifteen years after murdering his sister on Halloween night 1963, Michael Myers escapes from a mental hospital and returns to the small town of Haddonfield, Illinois to kill again.
cast: Donald Pleasence, Jamie Lee Curtis, Tony Moran

title: The Wicker Man
description: A puritan Police Sergeant arrives in a Scottish island village in search of a missing girl, whom the Pagan locals claim never existed.
cast: Edward Woodward, Christopher Lee, Diane Cilento

title: Psycho
description: A Phoenix secretary embezzles $40,000 from her employer's client, goes on the run, and checks into a remote motel run by a young man under the domination of his mother.
cast: Janet Leigh, Anthony Perkins, Vera Miles

title: Videodrome
description: A programmer at a TV station that specializes in adult entertainment searches for the producers of a dangerous and bizarre broadcast.
cast: James Woods, Debbie Harry, Sonja Smits

title: Evil Dead
description: Five friends travel to a cabin in the woods, where they unknowingly release flesh-possessing demons.
cast: Bruce Campbell, Betsy Baker, Ellen Sandweiss

title: The Thing
description: A research team in Antarctica is hunted by a shape-shifting alien that assumes the appearance of its victims.
cast: Kurt Russell, Wilford Brimley, Keith David

title: The Shining
description: A family heads to an isolated hotel for the winter where a sinister presence influences the father into violence, while his psychic son sees horrific forebodings from both past and future.
cast: Jack Nicholson, Shelley Duvall, Danny Lloyd

title: Halloween
description: Fifteen years after murdering his sister on Halloween night 1963, Michael Myers escapes from a mental hospital and returns to the small town of Haddonfield, Illinois to kill again.
cast: Donald Pleasence, Jamie Lee Curtis, Tony Moran

title: The Wicker Man
description: A puritan Police Sergeant arrives in a Scottish island village in search of a missing girl, whom the Pagan locals claim never existed.
cast: Edward Woodward, Christopher Lee, Diane Cilento

title: Psycho
description: A Phoenix secretary embezzles $40,000 from her employer's client, goes on the run, and checks into a remote motel run by a young man under the domination of his mother.
cast: Janet Leigh, Anthony Perkins, Vera Miles

title: Videodrome
description: A programmer at a TV station that specializes in adult entertainment searches for the producers of a dangerous and bizarre broadcast.
cast: James Woods, Debbie Harry, Sonja Smits

title: Hana-Bi
description: Nishi leaves the police in the face of harrowing personal and professional difficulties. Spiraling into depression, he makes questionable decisions.
cast: Takeshi Kitano, Kayoko Kishimoto, Ren Ôsugi

title: Ichi The Killer
description: As sadomasochistic yakuza enforcer Kakihara searches for his missing boss he comes across Ichi, a repressed and psychotic killer who may be able to inflict levels of pain that Kakihara has only dreamed of achieving.
cast: Tadanobu Asano, Nao Ōmori, Shin'ya Tsukamoto

title: Dead Man
description: On the run after murdering a man, accountant William Blake encounters a strange aboriginal American man named Nobody who prepares him for his journey into the spiritual world.
cast: Johnny Depp, Gary Farmer, Crispin Glover

title: The Godfather
description: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty in postwar New York City transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant youngest son.
cast: Marlon Brando, Al Pacino, James Caan

title: Blue Velvet
description: The discovery of a severed human ear found in a field leads a young man on an investigation related to a beautiful, mysterious nightclub singer and a group of psychopathic criminals who have kidnapped her child.
cast: Isabella Rossellini, Kyle MacLachlan, Dennis Hopper

title: One Flew Over The Cuckoo's Nest
description: A criminal pleads insanity and is admitted to a mental institution, where he rebels against the oppressive nurse and rallies up the scared patients.
cast: Jack Nicholson, Louise Fletcher, Michael Berryman

title: The Third Man
description: Pulp novelist Holly Martins travels to shadowy, postwar Vienna, only to find himself investigating the mysterious death of an old friend, Harry Lime.
cast: Orson Welles, Joseph Cotten, Alida Valli

title: The Prisoner
description: After resigning, a secret agent is abducted and taken to what looks like an idyllic village, but is really a bizarre prison. His warders demand information. He gives them nothing, but only tries to escape.
cast: Patrick McGoohan, Angelo Muscat, Peter Swanwick

title: I, Claudius
description: The history of the Roman Empire as experienced by one of its rulers.
cast: Derek Jacobi, Sian Phillips, Brian Blessed

title: Twin Peaks
description: An idiosyncratic FBI agent investigates the murder of a young woman in the even more idiosyncratic town of Twin Peaks.
cast: Kyle MacLachlan, Michael Ontkean, Mädchen Amick

title: Deadwood
description: A show set in the late 1800s, revolving around the characters of Deadwood, South Dakota; a town of deep corruption and crime.
cast: Timothy Olyphant, Ian McShane, Molly Parker

title: Tinker Tailor Soldier Spy
description: In the bleak days of the Cold War, espionage veteran George Smiley is forced out of semi-retirement to uncover a Soviet Agent within MI6's echelons.
cast: Alec Guinness, Alexander Knox, Ian Richardson

title: MPD Psycho
description: After his wife is murdered, a homicide detective develops multiple personalities and takes revenge on her killer. Years later the killer seems to reappear from the dead.
cast: Ren ÔsugiNaoki HosakaTomoko Nakajima

title: The Wire
description: The Baltimore drug scene, as seen through the eyes of drug dealers and law enforcement.
cast: Dominic West, John Doman, Deirdre Lovejoy

title: Night On Earth
description: An anthology of 5 different cab drivers in 5 American and European cities and their remarkable fares on the same eventful night.
cast: Winona Ryder, Gena Rowlands, Lisanne Falk

title: Monty Python and the Holy Grail
description: The Monty Python comedy clan skewers King Arthur and his Knights of the Round Table as they quest far and wide for the Holy Grail.
cast: Graham Chapman, John Cleese, Eric Idle

title: Team America: World Police
description: Popular Broadway actor Gary Johnston is recruited by the elite counter-terrorism organization Team America: World Police. As the world begins to crumble around him, he must battle with terrorists, celebrities and falling in love.
cast: Trey Parker, Matt Stone, Elle Russ

title: Gremlins
description: A young man inadvertently breaks three important rules concerning his new pet and unleashes a horde of malevolently mischievous monsters on a small town.
cast: Zach Galligan, Phoebe Cates, Hoyt Axton

title: The Big Lebowski
description: Ultimate L.A. slacker Jeff "The Dude" Lebowski, mistaken for a millionaire of the same name, seeks restitution for a rug ruined by debt collectors, enlisting his bowling buddies for help while trying to find the millionaire's missing wife.
cast: Jeff Bridges, John Goodman, Julianne Moore

title: Ghostbusters
description: Three parapsychologists forced out of their university funding set up shop as a unique ghost removal service in New York City, attracting frightened yet skeptical customers.
cast: Dan Aykroyd, Harold Ramis, Bill Murray

title: The Blues Brothers
description: Jake Blues, just out from prison, puts together his old band to save the Catholic home where he and brother Elwood were raised.
cast: John Belushi, Dan Aykroyd, Cab Calloway

title: The Ladykillers
description: Five oddball criminals planning a bank robbery rent rooms on a cul-de-sac from an octogenarian widow under the pretext that they are classical musicians.
cast: Alec Guinness, Peter Sellers, Cecil Parker

title: Dr Strangelove
description: An insane American general orders a bombing attack on the Soviet Union, triggering a path to nuclear holocaust that a war room full of politicians and generals frantically tries to stop.
cast: George C. Scott, Peter Sellers, Slim Pickens

title: Yes, Minister!
description: The Right Honorable James Hacker has landed the plum job of Cabinet Minister to the Department of Administration. At last he is in a position of power and can carry out some long-needed reforms, or so he thinks.
cast: Paul Eddington, Nigel Hawthorne, Derek Fowlds

title: Red Dwarf
description: As the last human man standing on the mining ship Red Dwarf, Dave Lister, the human-evolved Cat, and the hologram Rimmer are left to aimlessly wander the future.
cast: Chris Barrie, Craig Charles, Danny John-Jules

title: Blackadder
description: Blackadder follows the misfortunes of the ever-scheming Edmund Blackadder and his multiple incarnations from 1485 to 1917.
cast: Rowan Atkinson, Tim McInnerny, Tony Robinson

title: M*A*S*H
description: The staff of an Army hospital in the Korean War find that laughter is the best way to deal with their situation.
cast: Alan Alda, Wayne Rogers, Loretta Swit

title: Garth Marenghi's Darkplace
description: The series is set in a Hospital in Romford, which is situated over the gates of Hell.
cast: Richard Ayoade, Matt Berry, Matthew Holness

title: Metalocalypse
description: The epic and over-the-top adventures of Dethklok, the world's most successful death metal band.
cast: Brendon Small, Tommy Blacha, Mark Hamill

title: Curb Your Enthusiasm
description: The life and times of Larry David and the predicaments he gets himself into with his friends and complete strangers.
cast: Larry David, Cheryl Hines, Jeff Garlin

title: South Park
description: Follows the misadventures of four irreverent grade-schoolers in the quiet, dysfunctional town of South Park, Colorado.
cast: Trey Parker, Matt Stone, Isaac Hayes

title: Jam
description: A surreal, ambient mix of bleak comedy sketches.
cast: Christopher Morris, Amelia Bullmore, David Cann

title: Brass Eye
description: Chris Morris' controversal spoof of current affairs television, and the role of celebrity in the UK.
cast: Christopher Morris, Mark Heap, Kevin Eldon

title: Spaced
description: Friends Tim and Daisy, 20-something North Londoners with uncertain futures, must pretend to be a couple to live in the only apartment they can afford.
cast: Simon Pegg, Nick Frost, Jessica Hynes

title: Jodorwky's Dune
description: The story of cult film director Alejandro Jodorowsky's ambitious but ultimately doomed film adaptation of the seminal science fiction novel.
cast: Alejandro Jodorowsky, Chris Foss, H.R. Giger

title: Zappa
description: An in-depth look into the life and work of musician Frank Zappa.
cast: Frank Zappa, Lonnie Lardner, Patrice Zappa

title: Dangerous Days: Making Blade Runner
description: The definitive three-and-a-half hour documentary about the troubled creation and enduring legacy of the science fiction classic Blade Runner (1982), culled from 80 interviews and hours of never-before-seen outtakes and lost footage.
cast: Daryl Hannah, Rutger Hauer, Harrison Ford

title: Searching for the Wrong-Eyed Jesus
description: Alternative-country musician Jim White guides documentarian Andrew Douglas through the music and culture of the American South.
cast: Jim White, Harry Crews, Johnny Dowd

title: Hearts of Darkness: A Filmmaker's Apocalypse
description: Documentary that chronicles how Francis Ford Coppola's Apocalypse Now (1979) was plagued by extraordinary script, shooting, budget, and casting problems--nearly destroying the life and career of the celebrated director.
director: Fax Bahr, George Hickenlooper, Eleanor Coppola
cast: Dennis Hopper, Martin Sheen, Marlon Brando

title: From Bedrooms to Billions
description: A feature length documentary movie telling the remarkable, true story of the British Video Games Industry from 1979 to the present day.
cast: Shahid Ahmad, Nigel Alderton, Nick Alexander

title: From Bedrooms to Billions: The Amiga Years!
description: How the Commodore Amiga helped influence a generation of Developers to take Video Gaming to a whole new level.
cast: Shahid Ahmad, Richard Aplin, Brian Bagnall

title: The King of Kong
description: Die-hard gamers compete to break world records on classic arcade games.
cast: Steve Wiebe, Billy Mitchell, Mark Alpiger

title: Civilisation
description: Sir Kenneth Clarke guides us through the ages exploring the glorious rise of civilisation in western man. Beginning with the bleakness of the dark ages to the present day, we consider civilisation's articulations and expressions in some of man's finest works of art.
cast: Kenneth Clark, Ian Richardson, Ronald Lacey

title: Screenwipe
description: Charlie Brooker's caustic satirical take on the world of TV.
cast: Charlie Brooker, Al Campbell, David Firth

title: World At War
description: A groundbreaking 26-part documentary series narrated by the actor Laurence Olivier about the deadliest conflict in history, World War II.
cast: Laurence Olivier, Albert Speer, Anthony Eden

title: The Vietnam War
description: Ken Burns and Lynn Novick’s ten-part documentary tells the epic story of one of the most consequential, divisive, and controversial events in American history.
cast: Peter Coyote, Huy Duc, James Willbanks

title: Abroad in Britain
description: Jonathan Meades explores British place and culture in a series of films devoted to the proposition that the exotic begins at home.
cast: Jonathan Meades

title: Even Further Abroad
description: Once again casting an eye on British place and culture, Jonathan Meades peels off the drab brown overcoat of preconception to reveal the lime green posing pouch of reality beneath.
cast: Jonathan Meades

title: Victoria Died in 1901 and is Still Alive Today
description: Jonathan Meades explores the ever-enduring and often pernicious architectural and cultural legacy of Queen Victoria's reign.
cast: Jonathan Meades, Christopher Biggins, Skandar Keynes

title: Simon Schama's Power of Art
description: Historian Simon Schama explores eight of the great artists and the relationship between their work and the historical context of its creation.
cast: Simon Schama, Grégoire Bonnet, Allan Corduner

title: Predator
description: A team of commandos on a mission in a Central American jungle find themselves hunted by an extraterrestrial warrior.
cast: Arnold Schwarzenegger, Carl Weathers, Kevin Peter Hall

title: The Hitcher
description: A young man who escapes the clutches of a murderous hitchhiker is subsequently stalked by the hitcher and framed for his crimes.
cast: Rutger Hauer, C. Thomas Howell, Jennifer Jason Leigh

title: Hard Boiled
description: A tough-as-nails cop teams up with an undercover agent to shut down a sinister mobster and his crew.
cast: Chow Yun-Fat, Tony Chiu-Wai Leung, Teresa Mo

title: A Better Tomorrow
description: A reforming ex-gangster tries to reconcile with his estranged policeman brother, but the ties to his former gang are difficult to break.
cast: Lung Ti, Leslie Cheung, Chow Yun-Fat

title: You Only Live Twice
description: James Bond and the Japanese Secret Service must find and stop the true culprit of a series of space hijackings, before war is provoked between Russia and the United States.
cast: Sean Connery, Akiko Wakabayashi, Donald Pleasence

title: Die Hard
description: An NYPD officer tries to save his wife and several others taken hostage by German terrorists during a Christmas party at the Nakatomi Plaza in Los Angeles.
cast: Bruce Willis, Alan Rickman, Bonnie Bedelia

title: Akira
description: A secret military project endangers Neo-Tokyo when it turns a biker gang member into a rampaging psychic psychopath who can only be stopped by a teenager, his gang of biker friends and a group of psychics.
cast: Mitsuo Iwata, Nozomu Sasaki, Mami Koyama

title: Yojimbo
description: A crafty ronin comes to a town divided by two criminal gangs and decides to play them against each other to free the town.
cast: Toshirô Mifune, Eijirô Tôno, Tatsuya Nakadai

title: Spartacus: Blood and Sand
description: The life of Spartacus, the gladiator who lead a rebellion against the Romans. From his time as an ally of the Romans, to his betrayal and becoming a gladiator, to the rebellion he leads and its ultimate outcome.
cast: Andy Whitfield, Lucy Lawless, Manu Bennett

title: Miami Vice
description: Miami Vice follows two undercover detectives and their extended team through the mean streets of Miami, Florida.
cast: Don Johnson, Philip Michael Thomas, Saundra Santiago

title: Ash vs Evil Dead
description: Ash has spent the last thirty years avoiding responsibility, maturity, and the terrors of the Evil Dead until a Deadite plague threatens to destroy all of mankind and Ash becomes mankind's only hope.
cast: Bruce Campbell, Ray Santiago, Dana DeLorenzo

title: Barry
description: A hit man from the Midwest moves to Los Angeles and gets caught up in the city's theatre arts scene.
cast: Bill Hader, Stephen Root, Sarah Goldberg

title: Takeshi's Castle
description: A physical game show where 100 contestants attempt to progress through a series of devious and elaborate obstacles to face off with Count Takeshi and his minions.
cast: Takeshi Kitano, Hayato Tani, Michiru Jo

title: Archer
description: Covert black ops and espionage take a back seat to zany personalities and relationships between secret agents and drones.
cast: H. Jon Benjamin, Judy Greer, Amber Nash

title: Dragon Ball Z
description: The adventures of Earth's martial arts defender Son Goku continue with a new family and the revelation of his alien origin. Now Goku and his allies must defend the planet from an onslaught of new extraterrestrial enemies.
cast: Jôji Yanami, Kyle Hebert, Masako Nozawa
